title: Lyrics on the Wind
description: USA Today bestselling author Autumn Jones Lake pushes the romance full-throttle in the latest installment of the Lost Kings MC series.Feelings were a weakness I couldn’t afford.Until the sassy waitress from Texas crept under my skin.Then I fell and I fell hard.Her touch has branded me to the bone.With her, love has no boundaries.I’ve always lived for danger.But this time, the stakes are too high.Her lyrics on the wind are calling my name.No matter where this road takes me, my ruthless MC brothers have my back. Retribution will be swift and savage.
author: Autumn Jones Lake
